EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Bloodline
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Draconic Bloodline to embody.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Bloodline: Black
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Black Dragons are aligned with Acid spells.
You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each Core Ability you take in the tree including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +50 Spell Points +5 Spellpower associated with Acid Spellpower +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Bloodline: Blue
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Blue Dragons are aligned with Electric spells.
You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each Core Ability you take in the tree including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +50 Spell Points +5 Spellpower associated with Electric spellpower +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Bloodline: Green
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Green Dragons are aligned with Poison spells.
You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each Core Ability you take in the tree including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +50 Spell Points +5 Spellpower associated with Poison spellpower +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Bloodline: Red
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Red Dragons are aligned with Fire spells.
You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each Core Ability you take in the tree including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +50 Spell Points +5 Spellpower associated with Fire spellpower +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Bloodline: Shadow
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Shadow Dragons are aligned with Negative spells.
You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each Core Ability you take in the tree including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +50 Spell Points +5 Spellpower associated with Negative spellpower +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Bloodline: White
EnhancementSelection.Description:
White Dragons are aligned with Cold spells.
You gain the Magical Training Feat. Each Core Ability you take in the tree including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +50 Spell Points +5 Spellpower associated with Cold Spellpower +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Heritage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -5% Spell Point cost on all spells. Your spells no longer need material components, as if you had the Eschew Materials feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Elemental Blood
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -5% Spell Point cost on all spells. Casting spells that align with your Draconic Bloodline now trigger a 15% chance to grant yourself +10 temporary Hit Points per character level, these last for 10 seconds. This can only trigger once per 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Perception
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Spot, Search, and Reflex saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragonhide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Armor Class and Fortitude saving throws. Rank 3: You no longer fail Fortitude saves automaticall by rolling a ntaural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Attune the Arcane
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Draconic Destiny Mantle: Spells of the chosen element of your Draconic Heritage have a 25% chance to deal 1d6+6 bonus damage per caster level of that type. This has a cooldown of 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Draconic Destiny Mantle
Stance.Description: YSpells of the chosen element of your Draconic Heritage have a 25% chance to deal 1d6+6 bonus damage per caster level of that type. This has a cooldown of 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Scales
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Arcane Studies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Concentration and Spell Craft, +[1/2/3] Use Magic Device. Rank 3: +5 Spellpower of your Draconic Heritage and +5 Universal Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Breath Weapon DCs. Rank 3: Immunity to Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may now cast spells while Raging.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Breath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select you Epic Strike - a fearsome Draconic Breath Attack!

EnhancementSelection.Name: Black Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Conjure forth a torrent of Acid to melt your enemies. Deals 1d6+10 Acid damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the spray. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify, Enlarge Cooldown: [20/18/15] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blue Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Conjure forth a galvanic storm to electrocute your enemies. Deals 1d6+10 Electric damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the spray. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify, Enlarge Cooldown: [20/18/15] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Green Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Conjure forth a wave of poison to infect your enemies. Deals 1d6+10 Poison damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the area. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify, Enlarge Cooldown: [20/18/15] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Red Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Conjure forth a gout of flame to scorch your enemies. Deals 1d6+10 Fire damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the blaze. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify, Enlarge Cooldown: [20/18/15] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shadow Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Conjure forth a wave of shadow to terrify your enemies. Deals 1d6+10 Negative damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the blast. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify, Enlarge Cooldown: [20/18/15] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: White Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Strike: Conjure forth a spray of frost to freeze your enemies. Deals 1d6+10 Cold damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the ice. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify, Enlarge Cooldown: [20/18/15] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Speed of Magicks
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30]% Enhancement bonus to Movement Speed. Rank 3: You gain the Mobile Spellcasting feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Conduit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Double the Implement bonus of Quarterstaves you wield.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Piercing Spellcraft
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell Penetration

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Daunting Roar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Breath Weapons (including your Dragon Breath Epic Strike) have a 25% chance to paralyze enemies caught within them with fear for 6 seconds with no save. This can only affect each monster once - once they have been feared successfully, successive attempts will fail. Enemies that are immune to fear are immune to this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Scales of the Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this to shroud yourself in the Scales of a Dragon temporarily. This has two components - firstly, it absorbs 15 points of damage per Character Level in ablative protection. Secondly, it shields you from 50% of the Elemental Damage of your dragon type. The Elemental Damage shield will persist even if the ablative protection id depleted. Cost: 20 Spellpoints Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Arcane Spellsword
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a weapon sheathe to empower.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Archer
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Dice with Arcane Archer's Elemental of Force Arrows Toggle.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eldritch Knight
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Dice with Eldritch Knight's Spellsword Toggle.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Vile Chemist
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Dice with Vile Chemist's Poisoned Coating Toggle.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to increase its Spell DCs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration Spell DCs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation Spell DCs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Necromancy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Necromancy Spell DCs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Pull from the Wellspring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Wellspring of Power's duration is doubled. When you activate it, you gain +10 temporary Spell Points per Character Level that last for the full, doubled duration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Coalescence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You bypass the first [5/10/10] points of Damage Reduction with your spells. Rank 3: +10 Spellpower of your Draconic Heritage element and +10 Universal Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Elemental Inevitability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Conjure you Draconic Element to curse a single enemy with damage over time. Deals 1d6+3 damage per Character Level every 3 seconds for 12 seconds. Can stack 5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Energy Vortex
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your Draconic Destiny Mantle is on, casting Dragon Breath causes elemental energies to swirl around you, dealing 1d6 damage per caster level of your Draconic Heritage every 3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Epic Improved Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Metamagic to improve

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Quicken Metamagic by [1/2/4] spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Hellstorm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +15 Spellpower of your element, +15 Universal spellpower. Hellball is added to your Spellbook at level 8, assuming you can cast Level 8 spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ruin Intensified
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Ruin and Greater Ruin now apply a secondary burst of damage based on your Draconic Bloodline. This scales with the appropriate spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragonform
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Epic Moment: Activate this ability to take on the aspect of your Draconic Bloodline. This intensifies over the course of 30 seconds, with successive tiers adding to previous ones. Initial Activation: You become immune to elemental damage of your Draconic Bloodline for the duration. 5s: You gain DR 100/- and your hitpointsbegin to regenerate at a fast rate for the duration. 10s: Your spells gain a 50% cost reduction for the duration. 15s: Your Dragon Breath Epic Strike and Energy Vortex now deal souble damage for the duration. 20s: A pulse of elemental damage erupts from you, knocking down enemies in a large area for 2 seconds with no save, and dealing 1d6+6 Elemental damage per Character Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Spread your Wings
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Draconic wings sprout from you and propel you forward a moderate distance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Enhanced Draconic Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell DCs
